title: Layered ISR Planning
description: A planner must create a layered ISR plan to provide 24/7 surveillance of a high-threat area, using a mix of satellites, high-altitude drones, and medium-altitude drones.

tasks.description: Define the surveillance area and the required level of coverage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner accurately defines the mission parameters.

tasks.description: Schedule satellite passes for periodic, wide-area coverage.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner schedules regular satellite imagery to get the big picture.

tasks.description: Schedule overlapping shifts of high-altitude and medium-altitude drones to provide persistent, 24/7 video coverage of the area.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner creates a detailed and continuous surveillance schedule using multiple drone assets.
